Welcome aboard

Hi, I'm Zhonghan Qin

Researcher · Creator · Open-source enthusiast

I explore AI, embodied intelligence, and human-computer collaboration while documenting the world through photography. This digital garden gathers my research notes, side projects, and tools I maintain.

About

A journey through research and making

Keywords that shape my days: AI, information access, and creative expression.

  • I explore human-AI collaboration and applied intelligence, tracking emerging papers and tools.
  • I document cities and nature with photography, then turn those snapshots into stories and posts.
  • This site is my digital garden—feel free to wander around and revisit anytime.
